name: Morpheus (itch) (Infinitive Game Studios)
description:
Morpheus is a third person game with an emphasis on exploration, puzzle solving, and shape shifting.

We've been in production since January of 2017 and we're still improving the game when we can. We all work full time jobs and we do this as our passion. This version is not final and the game will be changing and growing.

Please send feedback to morpheusuat@gmail.com

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/MorpheusUAT
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MorpheusUAT/
  • Website: https://www.infinitivegames.com/

Thank you for your support!
